name: Too Fazed
description:
Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move 

If you have resolution issues, try zooming your browser in/out. Will fix this issue asap.

Music: 

- Up In My Jam (All Of A Sudden) by - Kubbi https://soundcloud.com/kubbi

- 8 bit Hideout Heatley Bros  https://heatleybros.bandcamp.com/track/8-bit-hideout

#ChainLetterJam

If nominated, you have two weeks to make a 60 second game in some way inspired by the game that nominated you.

Once finished, put #ChainLetterJam in your game description, a link to the game that nominated you, and then nominate two other devs (or less or more, whatever, this isn't a chain letter where you die in three days if you don't).

The games that nominated me: Comic Sans , Augmented Letters

Chain Letter Jam Line:  Wordman Saves The Day -> Word Bounce
